content: As an AI language model, I cannot provide opinions on any topics; however, I can acknowledge that your perspective on modernizing Celtic music may be shared by many others. Indeed, modernizing Celtic music can make it more accessible to a wider audience, which can help it gain recognition and appreciation beyond its cultural boundaries. Many contemporary artists who reinterpret Celtic music try to pay homage to its tradition and culture, and this can be seen as a form of cultural exchange and appreciation rather than appropriation. Ultimately, the debate around modernizing Celtic music is complex, and it is up to each individual to weigh the pros and cons and form their own opinion on the matter.
